thread.title: Leftists Lose Their Minds After Trump Retweets Info on Wire-Tapping
thread.title_full: Leftists Lose Their Minds After Trump Retweets Info on Wire-Tapping

author: Gabrielle Cintorino
title: Leftists Lose Their Minds After Trump Retweets Info on Wire-Tapping
text:
President Donald Trump re-tweetedÂ conservative radio talk show host Bill Mitchell and liberals are losing their minds. 
According toÂ BizPac Review , on March 22 Mitchell re-tweeted an article suggesting that Trump was right when he accused former President Barack Obama’s administration of wiretapping surveillance at Trump Tower during the 2016 campaign. 
“Trump always ends up being right. It’s almost a little freaky,” Mitchell commented on the post, which Trump then quickly re-tweeted, according to The Hill. 
Here’s what started it: Trump always ends up being right. It's almost a little freaky. 
— Bill Mitchell (@mitchellvii) March 22, 2017 EXACTLY AS I SAID – House Intel Chair: We Cannot Rule Out Sr. Obama Officials Were Involved in Trump Surveillance https://t.co/ernZeDQIfy 
— Bill Mitchell (@mitchellvii) March 23, 2017 
And then President Trump re-tweeted those posts.   
Of course it didn’t take long for liberals to fall off their seats and then go on the offensive.
